attributes.action: resign as prime minister on the grounds that he is no longer intrested in the people of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is time for a change.Gordon brown has lost touch with the people of this country his policies are all copied from the torries he has no new ideas why do we have to wait two years to get him and the labour party out wake up gordon you just aint good as a prinme minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
